tooltips.ownershipSetup: Select whether AngoraSix should help you manage and calculate ownership based on tracked contributions.
tooltips.financialSetup: Select whether you want AngoraSix to help track, manage and distribute project earnings.
tooltips.ownershipViaTasks: Configure how contributions to tasks translate into project ownership. All settings here are defaults that can be overridden per task.
tooltips.governance: Set up decision-making rules and voting mechanisms for your project. This includes coordination circles for operational decisions and voting limits to prevent dominance.
tooltips.profitSharing: Configure how project earnings will be distributed among contributors based on their ownership shares.
tooltips.currencies: Select which currencies your project will support for payments and profit sharing.
tooltips.distributionTrigger: Define the conditions that will trigger a vote on whether to start distributing profits to contributors.
